name: fitdesk
title: FitDesk
description: Micro-workouts to stay active while working
author: rasheed_s

commands.name: browse-exercises
commands.title: Browse Exercises
commands.subtitle: FitDesk
commands.description: Browse all available exercises by category

commands.name: view-statistics
commands.title: View Statistics
commands.subtitle: FitDesk
commands.description: View your exercise history and statistics

commands.name: exercise-reminder
commands.title: Exercise Reminder
commands.subtitle: FitDesk
commands.description: Menu bar reminder for exercise breaks

preferences.name: reminderInterval
preferences.title: Reminder Interval
preferences.description: How often to remind you to exercise

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
